                              <div class="line">And all combined, save what thou must combine</div>
                              <div class="line">By holy marriage: when and where and how</div>
                              <div class="line">We met, we woo'd and made exchange of vow,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell thee as we pass; but this I pray,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou consent to marry us to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Holy Saint Francis, what a change is here!</div>
                              <div class="line">Is Rosaline, whom thou didst love so dear,</div>
                              <div class="line">So soon forsaken? young men's love then lies</div>
                              <div class="line">Not truly in their hearts, but in their eyes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesu Maria, what a deal of brine</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath wash'd thy sallow cheeks for Rosaline!</div>
                              <div class="line">How much salt water thrown away in waste,</div>
                              <div class="line">To season love, that of it doth not taste!</div>
                              <div class="line">The sun not yet thy sighs from heaven clears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy old groans ring yet in my ancient ears;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, here upon thy cheek the stain doth sit</div>
                              <div class="line">Of an old tear that is not wash'd off yet:</div>
                              <div class="line">If e'er thou wast thyself and these woes thine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou and these woes were all for Rosaline:</div>
                              <div class="line">And art thou changed? pronounce this sentence then,</div>
                              <div class="line">Women may fall, when there's no strength in men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou chid'st me oft for loving Rosaline.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">For doting, not for loving, pupil mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">And bad'st me bury love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not in a grave,</div>
                              <div class="line">To lay one in, another out to have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, chide not; she whom I love now</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth grace for grace and love for love allow;</div>
                              <div class="line">The other did not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, she knew well</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy love did read by rote and could not spell.</div>
                              <div class="line">But come, young waverer, come, go with me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In one respect I'll thy assistant be;</div>
                              <div class="line">For this alliance may so happy prove,</div>
                              <div class="line">To turn your households' rancour to pure love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, let us hence; I stand on sudden haste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Wisely and slow; they stumble that run fast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE IV.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter BENVOLIO and MERCUTIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where the devil should this Romeo be?</div>
                              <div class="line">Came he not home to-night?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to his father's; I spoke with his man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, that same pale hard-hearted wench, that Rosaline.</div>
                              <div class="line">Torments him so, that he will sure run mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tybalt, the kinsman of old Capulet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath sent a letter to his father's house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A challenge, on my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Romeo will answer it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Any man that can write may answer a letter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, he will answer the letter's master, how he</div>
                              <div class="line">dares, being dared.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas poor Romeo! he is already dead; stabbed with a</div>
                              <div class="line">white wench's black eye; shot through the ear with a</div>
                              <div class="line">love-song; the very pin of his heart cleft with the</div>
                              <div class="line">blind bow-boy's butt-shaft: and is he a man to</div>
                              <div class="line">encounter Tybalt?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what is Tybalt?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">More than prince of cats, I can tell you. O, he is</div>
                              <div class="line">the courageous captain of compliments. He fights as</div>
                              <div class="line">you sing prick-song, keeps time, distance, and</div>
                              <div class="line">proportion; rests me his minim rest, one, two, and</div>
                              <div class="line">the third in your bosom: the very butcher of a silk</div>
                              <div class="line">button, a duellist, a duellist; a gentleman of the</div>
                              <div class="line">very first house, of the first and second cause:</div>
                              <div class="line">ah, the immortal passado! the punto reverso! the</div>
                              <div class="line">hai!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The pox of such antic, lisping, affecting</div>
                              <div class="line">fantasticoes; these new tuners of accents! 'By Jesu,</div>
                              <div class="line">a very good blade! a very tall man! a very good</div>
                              <div class="line">whore!' Why, is not this a lamentable thing,</div>
                              <div class="line">grandsire, that we should be thus afflicted with</div>
                              <div class="line">these strange flies, these fashion-mongers, these</div>
                              <div class="line">perdona-mi's, who stand so much on the new form,</div>
                              <div class="line">that they cannot at ease on the old bench? O, their</div>
                              <div class="line">bones, their bones!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ROMEO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Romeo, here comes Romeo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Without his roe, like a dried herring: flesh, flesh,</div>
                              <div class="line">how art thou fishified! Now is he for the numbers</div>
                              <div class="line">that Petrarch flowed in: Laura to his lady was but a</div>
                              <div class="line">kitchen-wench; marry, she had a better love to</div>
                              <div class="line">be-rhyme her; Dido a dowdy; Cleopatra a gipsy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Helen and Hero hildings and harlots; Thisbe a grey</div>
                              <div class="line">eye or so, but not to the purpose. Signior</div>
                              <div class="line">Romeo, bon jour! there's a French salutation</div>
                              <div class="line">to your French slop. You gave us the counterfeit</div>
                              <div class="line">fairly last night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow to you both. What counterfeit did I give you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The ship, sir, the slip; can you not conceive?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, good Mercutio, my business was great; and in</div>
                              <div class="line">such a case as mine a man may strain courtesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's as much as to say, such a case as yours</div>
                              <div class="line">constrains a man to bow in the hams.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Meaning, to court'sy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast most kindly hit it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">A most courteous exposition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I am the very pink of courtesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pink for flower.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then is my pump well flowered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said: follow me this jest now till thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">worn out thy pump, that when the single sole of it</div>
                              <div class="line">is worn, the jest may remain after the wearing sole singular.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">O single-soled jest, solely singular for the</div>
                              <div class="line">singleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come between us, good Benvolio; my wits faint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Switch and spurs, switch and spurs; or I'll cry a match.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, if thy wits run the wild-goose chase, I have</div>
                              <div class="line">done, for thou hast more of the wild-goose in one of</div>
                              <div class="line">thy wits than, I am sure, I have in my whole five:</div>
                              <div class="line">was I with you there for the goose?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wast never with me for any thing when thou wast</div>
                              <div class="line">not there for the goose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will bite thee by the ear for that jest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good goose, bite not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy wit is a very bitter sweeting; it is a most</div>
                              <div class="line">sharp sauce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">And is it not well served in to a sweet goose?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O here's a wit of cheveril, that stretches from an</div>
                              <div class="line">inch narrow to an ell broad!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I stretch it out for that word 'broad;' which added</div>
                              <div class="line">to the goose, proves thee far and wide a broad goose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, is not this better now than groaning for love?</div>
                              <div class="line">now art thou sociable, now art thou Romeo; now art</div>
                              <div class="line">thou what thou art, by art as well as by nature:</div>
                              <div class="line">for this drivelling love is like a great natural,</div>
                              <div class="line">that runs lolling up and down to hide his bauble in a hole.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stop there, stop there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou desirest me to stop in my tale against the hair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wouldst else have made thy tale large.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, thou art deceived; I would have made it short:</div>
                              <div class="line">for I was come to the whole depth of my tale; and</div>
                              <div class="line">meant, indeed, to occupy the argument no longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's goodly gear!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Nurse and PETER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A sail, a sail!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Two, two; a shirt and a smock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">My fan, Peter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Peter, to hide her face; for her fan's the</div>
                              <div class="line">fairer face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">God ye good morrow, gentlemen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">God ye good den, fair gentlewoman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it good den?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis no less, I tell you, for the bawdy hand of the</div>
                              <div class="line">dial is now upon the prick of noon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Out upon you! what a man are you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">One, gentlewoman, that God hath made for himself to</div>
                              <div class="line">mar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, it is well said; 'for himself to mar,'</div>
                              <div class="line">quoth a'? Gentlemen, can any of you tell me where I</div>
                              <div class="line">may find the young Romeo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I can tell you; but young Romeo will be older when</div>
                              <div class="line">you have found him than he was when you sought him:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the youngest of that name, for fault of a worse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">You say well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, is the worst well? very well took, i' faith;</div>
                              <div class="line">wisely, wisely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">if you be he, sir, I desire some confidence with</div>
                              <div class="line">you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She will indite him to some supper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A bawd, a bawd, a bawd! so ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">What hast thou found?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No hare, sir; unless a hare, sir, in a lenten pie,</div>
                              <div class="line">that is something stale and hoar ere it be spent.</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">An old hare hoar,</div>
                              <div class="line">And an old hare hoar,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is very good meat in lent</div>
                              <div class="line">But a hare that is hoar</div>
                              <div class="line">Is too much for a score,</div>
                              <div class="line">When it hoars ere it be spent.</div>
                              <div class="line">Romeo, will you come to your father's? we'll</div>
                              <div class="line">to dinner, thither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will follow you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, ancient lady; farewell,</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">'lady, lady, lady.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt MERCUTIO and BENVOLIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, farewell! I pray you, sir, what saucy</div>
                              <div class="line">merchant was this, that was so full of his ropery?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman, nurse, that loves to hear himself talk,</div>
                              <div class="line">and will speak more in a minute than he will stand</div>
                              <div class="line">to in a month.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">An a' speak any thing against me, I'll take him</div>
                              <div class="line">down, an a' were lustier than he is, and twenty such</div>
                              <div class="line">Jacks; and if I cannot, I'll find those that shall.</div>
                              <div class="line">Scurvy knave! I am none of his flirt-gills; I am</div>
                              <div class="line">none of his skains-mates. And thou must stand by</div>
                              <div class="line">too, and suffer every knave to use me at his pleasure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw no man use you a pleasure; if I had, my weapon</div>
                              <div class="line">should quickly have been out, I warrant you: I dare</div>
                              <div class="line">draw as soon as another man, if I see occasion in a</div>
                              <div class="line">good quarrel, and the law on my side.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, afore God, I am so vexed, that every part about</div>
                              <div class="line">me quivers. Scurvy knave! Pray you, sir, a word:</div>
                              <div class="line">and as I told you, my young lady bade me inquire you</div>
                              <div class="line">out; what she bade me say, I will keep to myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">but first let me tell ye, if ye should lead her into</div>
                              <div class="line">a fool's paradise, as they say, it were a very gross</div>
                              <div class="line">kind of behavior, as they say: for the gentlewoman</div>
                              <div class="line">is young; and, therefore, if you should deal double</div>
                              <div class="line">with her, truly it were an ill thing to be offered</div>
                              <div class="line">to any gentlewoman, and very weak dealing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nurse, commend me to thy lady and mistress. I</div>
                              <div class="line">protest unto thee--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Good heart, and, i' faith, I will tell her as much:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, Lord, she will be a joyful woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">What wilt thou tell her, nurse? thou dost not mark me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">I will tell her, sir, that you do protest; which, as</div>
                              <div class="line">I take it, is a gentlemanlike offer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid her devise</div>
                              <div class="line">Some means to come to shrift this afternoon;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there she shall at Friar Laurence' cell</div>
                              <div class="line">Be shrived and married. Here is for thy pains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">No truly sir; not a penny.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; I say you shall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">This afternoon, sir? well, she shall be there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">And stay, good nurse, behind the abbey wall:</div>
                              <div class="line">Within this hour my man shall be with thee</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring thee cords made like a tackled stair;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which to the high top-gallant of my joy</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be my convoy in the secret night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell; be trusty, and I'll quit thy pains:</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell; commend me to thy mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Now God in heaven bless thee! Hark you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou, my dear nurse?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Is your man secret? Did you ne'er hear say,</div>
                              <div class="line">Two may keep counsel, putting one away?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant thee, my man's as true as steel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NURSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir; my mistress is the sweetest lady--Lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord! when 'twas a little prating thing:--O, there</div>
                              <div class="line">is a nobleman in town, one Paris, that would fain</div>
                              <div class="line">lay knife aboard; but she, good soul, had as lief</div>
                              <div class="line">see a toad, a very toad, as see him. I anger her</div>
                              <div class="line">sometimes and tell her that Paris is the properer</div>
                              <div class="line">man; but, I'll warrant you, when I say so, she looks</div>
                              <div class="line">as pale as any clout in the versal world. Doth not</div>
                              <div class="line">rosemary and Romeo begin both with a letter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, nurse; what of that? both with an R.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah. mocker! that's the dog's name; R is for</div>
                              <div class="line">the--No; I know it begins with some other</div>
                              <div class="line">letter:--and she hath the prettiest sententious of</div>
                              <div class="line">it, of you and rosemary, that it would do you good</div>
                              <div class="line">to hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to thy lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, a thousand times.</div>
                              <p>Exit Romeo</p>
                              <div class="line">Peter!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter, take my fan, and go before and apace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE V.  Capulet's orchard.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter JULIET</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">The clock struck nine when I did send the nurse;</div>
                              <div class="line">In half an hour she promised to return.</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance she cannot meet him: that's not so.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, she is lame! love's heralds should be thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which ten times faster glide than the sun's beams,</div>
                              <div class="line">Driving back shadows over louring hills:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore do nimble-pinion'd doves draw love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore hath the wind-swift Cupid wings.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now is the sun upon the highmost hill</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this day's journey, and from nine till twelve</div>
                              <div class="line">Is three long hours, yet she is not come.</div>
                              <div class="line">Had she affections and warm youthful blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">She would be as swift in motion as a ball;</div>
                              <div class="line">My words would bandy her to my sweet love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his to me:</div>
                              <div class="line">But old folks, many feign as they were dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">Unwieldy, slow, heavy and pale as lead.</div>
                              <div class="line">O God, she comes!</div>
                              <p>Enter Nurse and PETER</p>
                              <div class="line">O honey nurse, what news?</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast thou met with him? Send thy man away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter, stay at the gate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit PETER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good sweet nurse,--O Lord, why look'st thou sad?</div>
                              <div class="line">Though news be sad, yet tell them merrily;</div>
                              <div class="line">If good, thou shamest the music of sweet news</div>
                              <div class="line">By playing it to me with so sour a face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a-weary, give me leave awhile:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, how my bones ache! what a jaunt have I had!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I would thou hadst my bones, and I thy news:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come, I pray thee, speak; good, good nurse, speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesu, what haste? can you not stay awhile?</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you not see that I am out of breath?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">How art thou out of breath, when thou hast breath</div>
                              <div class="line">To say to me that thou art out of breath?</div>
                              <div class="line">The excuse that thou dost make in this delay</div>
                              <div class="line">Is longer than the tale thou dost excuse.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is thy news good, or bad? answer to that;</div>
                              <div class="line">Say either, and I'll stay the circumstance:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be satisfied, is't good or bad?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, you have made a simple choice; you know not</div>
                              <div class="line">how to choose a man: Romeo! no, not he; though his</div>
                              <div class="line">face be better than any man's, yet his leg excels</div>
                              <div class="line">all men's; and for a hand, and a foot, and a body,</div>
                              <div class="line">though they be not to be talked on, yet they are</div>
                              <div class="line">past compare: he is not the flower of courtesy,</div>
                              <div class="line">but, I'll warrant him, as gentle as a lamb. Go thy</div>
                              <div class="line">ways, wench; serve God. What, have you dined at home?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no: but all this did I know before.</div>
                              <div class="line">What says he of our marriage? what of that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, how my head aches! what a head have I!</div>
                              <div class="line">It beats as it would fall in twenty pieces.</div>
                              <div class="line">My back o' t' other side,--O, my back, my back!</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew your heart for sending me about,</div>
                              <div class="line">To catch my death with jaunting up and down!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I' faith, I am sorry that thou art not well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet, sweet, sweet nurse, tell me, what says my love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Your love says, like an honest gentleman, and a</div>
                              <div class="line">courteous, and a kind, and a handsome, and, I</div>
                              <div class="line">warrant, a virtuous,--Where is your mother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is my mother! why, she is within;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where should she be? How oddly thou repliest!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Your love says, like an honest gentleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is your mother?'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">O God's lady dear!</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you so hot? marry, come up, I trow;</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the poultice for my aching bones?</div>
                              <div class="line">Henceforward do your messages yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's such a coil! come, what says Romeo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you got leave to go to shrift to-day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Nurse</div>
                              <div class="line">Then hie you hence to Friar Laurence' cell;</div>
                              <div class="line">There stays a husband to make you a wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now comes the wanton blood up in your cheeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">They'll be in scarlet straight at any news.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hie you to church; I must another way,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fetch a ladder, by the which your love</div>
                              <div class="line">Must climb a bird's nest soon when it is dark:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the drudge and toil in your delight,</div>
                              <div class="line">But you shall bear the burden soon at night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go; I'll to dinner: hie you to the cell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Hie to high fortune! Honest nurse, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.8">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>7. SCENE VI.  Friar Laurence's cell.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FRIAR LAURENCE and ROMEO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">So smile the heavens upon this holy act,</div>
                              <div class="line">That after hours with sorrow chide us not!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, amen! but come what sorrow can,</div>
                              <div class="line">It cannot countervail the exchange of joy</div>
                              <div class="line">That one short minute gives me in her sight:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do thou but close our hands with holy words,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then love-devouring death do what he dare;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is enough I may but call her mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">These violent delights have violent ends</div>
                              <div class="line">And in their triumph die, like fire and powder,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which as they kiss consume: the sweetest honey</div>
                              <div class="line">Is loathsome in his own deliciousness</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the taste confounds the appetite:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore love moderately; long love doth so;</div>
                              <div class="line">Too swift arrives as tardy as too slow.</div>
                              <p>Enter JULIET</p>
                              <div class="line">Here comes the lady: O, so light a foot</div>
                              <div class="line">Will ne'er wear out the everlasting flint:</div>
                              <div class="line">A lover may bestride the gossamer</div>
                              <div class="line">That idles in the wanton summer air,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet not fall; so light is vanity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Good even to my ghostly confessor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Romeo shall thank thee, daughter, for us both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">As much to him, else is his thanks too much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, Juliet, if the measure of thy joy</div>
                              <div class="line">Be heap'd like mine and that thy skill be more</div>
                              <div class="line">To blazon it, then sweeten with thy breath</div>
                              <div class="line">This neighbour air, and let rich music's tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Unfold the imagined happiness that both</div>
                              <div class="line">Receive in either by this dear encounter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Conceit, more rich in matter than in words,</div>
                              <div class="line">Brags of his substance, not of ornament:</div>
                              <div class="line">They are but beggars that can count their worth;</div>
                              <div class="line">But my true love is grown to such excess</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot sum up sum of half my wealth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR LAURENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come with me, and we will make short work;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, by your leaves, you shall not stay alone</div>
                              <div class="line">Till holy church incorporate two in one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A public place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Capulet's orchard.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Friar Laurence's cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in Capulet's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  Capulet's orchard.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A public place.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MERCUTIO, BENVOLIO, Page, and Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, good Mercutio, let's retire:</div>
                              <div class="line">The day is hot, the Capulets abroad,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, if we meet, we shall not scape a brawl;</div>
                              <div class="line">For now, these hot days, is the mad blood stirring.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art like one of those fellows that when he</div>
                              <div class="line">enters the confines of a tavern claps me his sword</div>
                              <div class="line">upon the table and says 'God send me no need of</div>
                              <div class="line">thee!' and by the operation of the second cup draws</div>
                              <div class="line">it on the drawer, when indeed there is no need.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I like such a fellow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, thou art as hot a Jack in thy mood as</div>
                              <div class="line">any in Italy, and as soon moved to be moody, and as</div>
                              <div class="line">soon moody to be moved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And what to?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, an there were two such, we should have none</div>
                              <div class="line">shortly, for one would kill the other. Thou! why,</div>
                              <div class="line">thou wilt quarrel with a man that hath a hair more,</div>
                              <div class="line">or a hair less, in his beard, than thou hast: thou</div>
                              <div class="line">wilt quarrel with a man for cracking nuts, having no</div>
                              <div class="line">other reason but because thou hast hazel eyes: what</div>
                              <div class="line">eye but such an eye would spy out such a quarrel?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy head is as fun of quarrels as an egg is full of</div>
                              <div class="line">meat, and yet thy head hath been beaten as addle as</div>
                              <div class="line">an egg for quarrelling: thou hast quarrelled with a</div>
                              <div class="line">man for coughing in the street, because he hath</div>
                              <div class="line">wakened thy dog that hath lain asleep in the sun:</div>
                              <div class="line">didst thou not fall out with a tailor for wearing</div>
                              <div class="line">his new doublet before Easter? with another, for</div>
                              <div class="line">tying his new shoes with old riband? and yet thou</div>
                              <div class="line">wilt tutor me from quarrelling!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">An I were so apt to quarrel as thou art, any man</div>
                              <div class="line">should buy the fee-simple of my life for an hour and a quarter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The fee-simple! O simple!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">By my head, here come the Capulets.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">By my heel, I care not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter TYBALT and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow me close, for I will speak to them.</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen, good den: a word with one of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And but one word with one of us? couple it with</div>
                              <div class="line">something; make it a word and a blow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall find me apt enough to that, sir, an you</div>
                              <div class="line">will give me occasion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Could you not take some occasion without giving?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">Mercutio, thou consort'st with Romeo,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Consort! what, dost thou make us minstrels? an</div>
                              <div class="line">thou make minstrels of us, look to hear nothing but</div>
                              <div class="line">discords: here's my fiddlestick; here's that shall</div>
                              <div class="line">make you dance. 'Zounds, consort!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENVOLIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We talk here in the public haunt of men:</div>
                              <div class="line">Either withdraw unto some private place,</div>
                              <div class="line">And reason coldly of your grievances,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else depart; here all eyes gaze on us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Men's eyes were made to look, and let them gaze;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not budge for no man's pleasure, I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ROMEO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, peace be with you, sir: here comes my man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCUTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But I'll be hanged, sir, if he wear your livery:</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, go before to field, he'll be your follower;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your worship in that sense may call him 'man.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">Romeo, the hate I bear thee can afford</div>
                              <div class="line">No better term than this,--thou art a villain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tybalt, the reason that I have to love thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth much excuse the appertaining rage</div>
                              <div class="line">To such a greeting: villain am I none;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore farewell; I see thou know'st me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TYBALT</div>
                              <div class="line">Boy, this shall not excuse the injuries</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou hast done me; therefore turn and draw.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROMEO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do protest, I never injured thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">But love thee better than thou canst devise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till thou shalt know the reason of my love:</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, good Capulet,--which name I tender</div>
                              <div class="line">As dearly as my own,--be satisfied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
